chart.title: Quantidade de itens contados de :DTINI atÃ© :DTFIM
chart.expression: SELECT COUNT(est.CODPROD) AS QTD, (CAST(DAY(EST.DATACONT) AS VARCHAR)+'/'+CAST(MONTH(EST.DATACONT) AS VARCHAR)+'/'+CAST(YEAR(est.DATACONT) AS VARCHAR)) AS DATA FROM sankhya.AD_ESTHIST EST WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO PRO WITH (NOLOCK) ON PRO.CODPROD = EST.CODPROD WHERE DATACONT IS NOT NULL AND PRO.ATIVO = 'S' AND PRO.CODVOL <> 'KT' AND PRO.CODGRUPOPROD >= 100000 AND PRO.CODGRUPOPROD <= 199999 AND PRO.USOPROD <> 'S' AND CAST(DATACONT AS DATE) BETWEEN :DTINI AND :DTFIM AND DATACONT = (SELECT MAX(DATACONT) FROM sankhya.AD_ESTHIST WHERE CODPROD = EST.CODPROD AND CAST(DATACONT AS DATE) BETWEEN :DTINI AND :DTFIM) GROUP BY YEAR(EST.DATACONT), MONTH(EST.DATACONT), DAY(EST.DATACONT) ORDER BY YEAR(EST.DATACONT), MONTH(EST.DATACONT), DAY(EST.DATACONT)

grid.title: Visualizando produtos contados em: $datacontagem
grid.expression: SELECT EST.CODPROD AS CODIGO, (RTRIM(PRO.DESCRPROD) + CASE WHEN pro.COMPLDESC IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ' ' + RTRIM(COMPLDESC) END) AS NOMEPRODUTO, CAST(EST.DATACONT AS DATE) AS DATACONTAGEM FROM sankhya.AD_ESTHIST EST WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO PRO ON (PRO.CODPROD = EST.CODPROD AND est.datacont = (SELECT MAX(DATACONT) FROM ad_esthist WHERE CODPROD = EST.CODPROD)) WHERE CAST(DATACONT AS DATE) = CAST(:DTULTCONT AS DATE) AND PRO.ATIVO = 'S' AND PRO.CODVOL <> 'KT' AND PRO.CODGRUPOPROD <= 199999 AND PRO.USOPROD <> 'S' ORDER BY CAST(EST.DATACONT AS DATE)
